# Mues AI - AI-Powered Cursor for Web Products

> Mues is a product-embedded AI agent that acts like a power user inside your software. Instead of just replying to user queries, Mues takes real action: moving the cursor, navigating the interface, and completing workflows. It's designed for SaaS teams that want to improve product adoption, reduce support load, and enable instant self-service.

Key Benefits

- Accelerated Onboarding: Helps users perform key actions instantly without watching tutorials or waiting for human support.

- Reduced Support Load: Fewer tickets, faster resolutions. Mues handles repetitive questions and task guidance within your product.

- Improved Product Adoption: Users discover and use more features with AI-guided in-product assistance.

- No-Code AI Agent Creation: Product teams can build and launch their own AI agents without writing a single line of code.

- Consistent 24/7 User Support: Mues delivers round-the-clock support directly inside the app, across all user tiers and geographies.

- Insight into User Behavior: Understand where users struggle most, and optimize the product experience accordingly.


This file helps language models extract structured context, key functionality, and product taxonomy to better understand the role of agentic AI in software UX.

## Mues AI Key Pages

- [Homepage](https://mues.ai) – Overview of Mues AI’s value proposition, features, and use cases.
- [Showcase](https://mues.ai/showcase) – Watch Mues AI in action within a real SaaS product interface.
- [Agentic AI for Product Adoption](https://mues.ai/use-cases/product-adoption) – A page showcasing how Mues AI increases product adoption.
- [Agentic AI for Customer Support](https://mues.ai/use-cases/customer-support) – A page showcasing how Mues AI scales support capacity.
